person.persName: Christopher C. Botts (Montgomery County, Kentucky, saddler)

body.p: Montgomery County, Kentucky, saddler. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Botts and Virginia Christopher Botts. Married to Nannie Jane Felix Botts in Woodford County, Kentucky, on December 22, 1864. Father of Joseph S. Botts. Saddler in Montgomery County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Montgomery County in 1860. Household owned an additional twenty enslaved persons in Montgomery County in 1860. Saddler in Montgomery County in 1863.
